Ledu/mit/icc_intent_class_modeling/MainA: The method originates user personal data by calling the sensitive API getDeviceId() from Landroid/telephony/TelephonyManager;. This device ID is stored in register v1. The method then sets this device ID as an action for a new intent. Finally, it logs the intent's action using Landroid/util/Log;i(Ljava/lang/String; Ljava/lang/String;)I.
